panels.description: This is the sum of container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total / container_cpu_cfs_periods_total
panels.title: Average Container CPU Throttling Percentage

panels.description:
This is the container_cpu_usage_seconds_total rate per container for pods $adc_podlist.

This translates to cpu millisecond used per 1000milliseconds. 1 ms/second = 1 millicore
panels.title: Container CPU Core Usage

panels.description: This is the container_memory_working_set_bytes usage per container for pods $adc_podlist.
panels.title: Container Memory Usage

panels.description:
This is the container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total  per container for pods $adc_podlist. 

This represents the amount of millisceconds per 1000 milliseconds that a container has been throttled
panels.title: Container CPU Throttling

panels.description: This is the container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total / container_cpu_cfs_periods_total for pods $adc_podlist.

options.content:
The 2 graphs opposite show information for the following GAS APIs:


\"/ui-meta/v1/apps\" API
\"/ui-meta/v1/groups\" API
\"/ui-meta/v1/components\" API
\"/ui\" API
\"/ui-logging/v1/logs\" API
\"/gas-internal\" API
\"/ui-serve/v1/import-map\" API
\"/ui-serve/v1/list-packages\" API
\"/ui-serve/v1/static\" API

panels.title: GAS API Graphs Content
Rate of requests to APIs
Rate: Time (in ms) spent in backend with processing requests to the APIs
$gas_app specific info
Total number of Service K8s discovered resources
Total number of Pod K8s discovered resources
Total number of Endpoint K8s discovered resources
Total user and system CPU time spent in seconds.
Resident memory size in bytes
To be Checked -> 'To' date - Start time of the process since unix epoch in seconds
Virtual memory size in bytes
Process heap size in bytes
Number of open file descriptors
Maximum number of open file descriptors
Lag of event loop in seconds
The minimum recorded event loop delay
The maximum recorded event loop delay
The mean of the recorded event loop delays
The standard deviation of the recorded event loop delays
The 50th percentile of the recorded event loop delays
The 90th percentile of the recorded event loop delays
The 99th percentile of the recorded event loop delays
The sum of retry counters of in-progress fetch loops
Total number of active handles
Sum of Number of active libuv handles grouped by handle type. Every handle type is C++ class name
Number of active libuv requests grouped by request type. Every request type is C++ class name
